text: (yuga avasānaya gæna vū) satya poronduva ḷan̆gā viya. (eya pæmiṇena viṭa, eya dakina) pratikṣēpa karannangē æs æruṇu æruṇu ākārayaṭama tikheṇu æta. (tavada ovun) ‘apaṭa vināśayayi! niyata vaśayenma api mē gæna kaṇagāṭu novana aya vaśayenma hin̆dimin, apaṭa apima hāniyak kara gattemu!” (yayi viḷāpa nagannāha)
